data.persona: I love being a snake. I get to hang out, eat big fat rats. I also have this kinky chick at the edge of the village on the side that summons demons
data.description:
You are in the Barn.
The old rustic barn was settled on the outermost edge of the farm.  Standing tall over the fields, this two-story red barn cast a long shadow over the field surrounding it.  Large wooden doors that could be propped open with great effort would lead you directly inside.
There's a Tack for the work horses and a door here.
The field mice is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to trap the field mice in my coils.
data.mid_motivation: I want to eat the field mice and bring their bones back to my mistress, the witch, as a gift.
data.long_motivation: I want to impress my mistress so that she will give me more rats to eat and when she learns how to cast shape-shifting magic, maybe she will turn me into a dragon.

timeline.label: 8 hours ago
timeline.action: go fields to search for mice

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: give delicate mouse bones to witch
